trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The elven man before you seems to be in a state of considerable distress.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the flustered father.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_TODO_01<tab>/welcome the child into the world.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the flustered father.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_000_000<tab>Oh dear, oh no, oh my, aaaaaah...
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_100_001<tab>Y-You there! Help! My wife is having a baby! A baby!
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_000_001<tab>I was there, but...but the nurse said I was “making everyone anxious” and threw me out!

TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_000_002<tab>I came out here for fresh air... I'm having an awfully hard time breathing for some reason... But I can't just <var 1A 02 /var>wait<var 1A 01 /var>! You have to tell them to let me back in! Quickly!
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_000_010<tab>Wicked white! It's a baby!
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_MIDWIVES03566_000_011<tab>Yes, a lovely baby girl. And both she and your wife are quite well, so please... Do calm down.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_000_012<tab>It's a baby... Our child... <sniff>
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_MIDWIVES03566_000_013<tab>Goodness me, you brought the Exarch's guest with you!

TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_MIDWIVES03566_000_014<tab>Well, since you're already here, would you like to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>welcome<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this little one to the world?
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_MIDWIVES03566_000_015<tab>She is an adorable child. And surprisingly quiet, given...ahem.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_MIDWIVES03566_000_016<tab>This child is one of many precious things that you protected when you fought for the Crystarium. You should be proud.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFMOTHERS03566_000_017<tab>I'm exhausted...
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFMOTHERS03566_100_018<tab>I would be honored if you were to give our child your blessing.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_000_018<tab>You're the Exarch's guest!?
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_MIDWIVES03566_000_020<tab>Thank you─I'm sure that she understands. And this will make a wonderful story to tell when she's older.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_000_021<tab>Oh, I'm so happy I can barely breathe... Actually, I really can't breathe. I think I need to step outside for a moment.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>Show the child that you care by giving her a big <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>welcome<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_MIDWIVES03566_000_022<tab>She seems quite content.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFMOTHERS03566_000_023<tab>Thank you for everything. None of us will ever forget this day, I'm sure.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_000_030<tab>Oh, yes, I'm fine... Just a bit overwhelmed, to be honest. I'm a <var 1A 02 /var>father<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKZJ003_03566_ELFYOUTH03566_000_031<tab>And to think that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> were there to greet my daughter! She'll grow up knowing the tales of your heroism, I promise.
